thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Home Bancorp Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.54

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Home Bancorp Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.54
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Home Bancorp Inc:
* HOME BANCORP ANNOUNCES 2017 ANNUAL AND FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS AND INCREASES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.54 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.62 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ‍NET INTEREST INCOME FOR Q4 OF 2017 TOTALED $20.0 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF $4.1 MILLION, OR 26%, COMPARED TO Q3 OF 2017​
* ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS INCREASED QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND ON SHARES OF COMMON STOCK TO $0.15 PER SHARE​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
